root.name: Turok 3: Shadow of Oblivion
root.description: OverviewTurok 3: Shadow of Oblivion follows the story of the previous game, Turok 2: Seeds of Evil, and pits the player against a malevolent force known as "Oblivion" and it's minions. Turok 3 also gives the player a choice in the main protagonist they control. The player can choose between either Joseph or Danielle Fireseed, the brother and sister of Joshua Fireseed, who was the 'Turok' from the previous game.WeaponsA number of new weapons have been introduced in Turok 3, as have many old ones returned. Both Danielle and Joseph have their own specific weapons as well a set available to both:DanielleTomahawkTek BowMag. 60Firestorm CannonFireswarmRPG LauncherCerebal BurstJosephBladeStorm BowSilenced PistolSniper RifleShredderNapalm CannonCerebal PossessorBothRazorwindBow ArrowPistolAssault RifleShotgunVampire GunGrenade LauncherCerebal BorePersonal Singularity Generator
